name: Boxing School
description: BOXING SCHOOL! Take control of a boxing gym in the 80s. You’ll hire the boxers, teach them to fight and climb the ranks. New management game made by the developers of Gladiator School.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 2 GB available space
